text: jo ganvaar dehaatee (hudaibiya se) peechhe rah gae ab vah tumase kahenge ki hamako hamaare maal aur ladake vaalon ne rok rakha to aap hamaare vaaste (khuda se) magaphirat kee dua maangen ye log apanee zabaan se aisee baaten kahate hain jo unake dil mein nahin (ai rasool) tum kah do ki agar khuda tum logon ko nuqasaan pahunchaana chaahe ya tumhen phaayada pahunchaane ka iraada kare to khuda ke muqaabale mein tumhaare lie kisaka bas chal sakata hai balki jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase khoob vaaqiph hai
